metadata.Title: CVE-2014-6396 on Ubuntu 14.04 ESM (trusty) - medium.
metadata.Description: The dissector_postgresql function in dissectors/ec_postgresql.c in Ettercap before 0.8.1 allows remote attackers to cause a denial of service and possibly execute arbitrary code via a crafted password length, which triggers a 0 character to be written to an arbitrary memory location.

criterions.comment: ettercap: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
